titles: A most true relation of a very dreadfull earth-quake with the lamentable effectes thereof, vvhich began vpon the 8. of December 1612. and yet continueth most fearefull in Munster in Germanie. Reade and tremble. Translated out of Dutch by Charles Demetrius, publike notarie in London.
author: Demetrius, Charles.
place: Printed at Rotterdame in Holland [i.e. London] :
publisher: [By T. Snodham] at the signe of the White gray-hound,
notes: Actual place of publication and printer's name from STC; Publication date conjectered by STC.
Running title reads: Feareful newes, from Munster in Germany.
An English translation, by Charles Demetrius, from the Dutch original.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
